data.name: Akrati Pandey
data.headline: Scrum Master
data.about: Certified Scrum Master with strong experience owning all stages of the life cycle to deliver projects that exceed expectations on time and on budget. Skilled in using benchmarks, industry metrics, and innovative methodologies to manage sensitive projects with high-performing teams. Possess extensive knowledge in Agile, Scrum and Kanban, as well as SAFe and capable of driving an overwhelming adoption and enforcement of scrum rules and practices. Demonstrated ability to motivate, organize, lead, and coach leadership and product teams across multiple locations with a proven track record of driving complex projects. I am eager to join a highly collaborative and energetic team and believe my extensive knowledge and experience would benefit any team.

data.name: Vandana Yadav
data.headline: Engineering Visionary  Creating AI-Driven Farms That Think, Decide & Deliver
data.about: Agriculture is facing a transformation. Rising costs, unpredictable weather, and labor shortages are forcing landowners and agri-businesses to rethink how farming works. I’m building MotherFarm to meet that challenge head-on. MotherFarm is an autonomous farming ecosystem designed to make intelligent decisions from seed selection to crop scheduling  based on real-time environmental data. It’s not just automation; it’s a system that thinks, adapts, and delivers measurable outcomes. My goal is simple: to help agri-businesses turn uncertainty into opportunity by making their land smarter, more productive, and future-ready. If you're exploring how AI can drive ROI in agriculture — let's connect.
